definitions.definition: remove impurities or unwanted elements from (a substance), typically as part of an industrial process.
examples: sugar was refined by boiling it in huge iron vats

definitions.definition: improve (something) by making small changes, in particular make (an idea, theory, or method) more subtle and accurate.
examples: ease of access to computers has refined analysis and presentation of data
synonyms: fine-tune "helping students to refine their language skills"
